marklogic.body: Peking University Southeast doors north side of carpark attendants ,Abercrombie, Mr. Zhang said that yesterday morning ,Adidas F50, the door of the southeast gathered hundreds of visitors lined up into the school to visit , the team of about ten meters . Due to a few meters of the front of the school is the road, visitors team did not break open , they turn into the parking lot. Visitors to the parking lot entrance block was packed , many of which are children , parking access very frequent vehicle out of the thing ,abercrombie, who cares ? . Have come here to the door at the southeast about 10:00 yesterday ,polo Ralph Lauren, he took a few tour groups requiring forced into the school , as an expression of protest, block after block of them . allowed to enter ,longchamp soldes, several security yelled prepared to insist forcing the visitors . Ten minutes later, the Security Department sent staff will please the tourists line up in the parking lot out , the team has been diverted to the parking lot outside near the flyover . Peking University Security Department responsible person,mercurial pas cher, recently ,mercurial vapor, Peking University, officially entered the summer tourism open day , visitors increased significantly . To strengthen the management , the school provides visitors must be registered from the southeast door to enter the small door at the registration point in the north of the southeast door . The official acknowledged that yesterday morning there parking administrator Dumen , may be some security is handled properly, leading to the two sides clashed . Currently , the school has increased the intensity of order maintenance to Ensure the safety of tourists . 相关的主题文章： 投注站老板代购彩票中500万归还购买者(组图) 清华大学副教授戴绿领巾反歧视 校车司机骑车上班时摔下猝死校门口 police criticism, the father of the baby Blushing even said: I remember the police officer told Mr. Jiang said
